profile:
Feel the Ford Painting difference!

Ford Painting is a professional painting company servicing the Golden Horseshoe. We take pride in cleanliness and respect of our client's home. When quality and craftsmanship meet, you will be able to discover a new home within the same walls. It is amazing what a fresh coat of paint or a colour overhaul can mean. Check out our photos for recent work!

Contact Ford Painting via phone or send an email for a FREE, NO OBLIGATION QUOTE!

$2 Million in Liability Insurance

profile: We specialize in flooring, painting, and bathroom renovations because that is what we enjoy doing the most. We have worked on many homes whether it be to increase value for a sale or to remodel for personal use. We do not leave the jobsite until everything has been completed as asked and agreed upon and the jobsite cleaned up. Call or email for a quick quote

profile:
Kevlar Custom Finishing & Design is a family oriented business. The Biggs Family has been doing business in Hamilton and the surrounding areas since 1950. Romello Biggs is the president and has been running the company since 2018.

Romello and his team are there every step of the way once a project is taken on. He has an impeccable team who are able to successfully complete a project of any capacity. Romello and his team ensure they deliver their services in the timeliest manner while honoring 100% client satisfaction
services:
-Interior/Exterior Painting
-Home Remodeling
-Interior Design
-Color Consultation
-General Contracting
-Project Management
-Bathroom Remodeling
Pre-Construction/Construction/Post construction expertise
